formula.text:
AVG( 
    CASE 
    WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Finish") <= (<%=toleranceBeforeEnd%>+0) AND KPI("Difference Planned Actual Finish") >= (<%=toleranceAfterEnd%>+0)*(-1)
    THEN 1.0 
    ELSE 0.0 
    END 
)

AVG(
    CASE 
    WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Start") <=(<%=toleranceBeforeStart%>+0) AND KPI("Difference Planned Actual Start") >= (<%=toleranceAfterStart%>+0)*(-1)
    THEN 1.0
    ELSE 0.0
    END
)

meta.expressionLhs: CASE WHEN REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( PU_LAST ( "AFPO" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Scheduled start time' ) , DAYS ) - REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( PU_LAST ( "AFPO" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Actual start time' ) , DAYS ) > ( 2 + 0 ) THEN 'too early' WHEN REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( PU_LAST ( "AFPO" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Scheduled start time' ) , DAYS ) - REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( PU_LAST ( "AFPO" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Actual start time' ) , DAYS ) < ( 2 + 0 ) * ( -1 ) THEN 'too late' ELSE 'on time' END AS "#{adherenceSchedules}"

axis0.name: #{adherenceSchedules}
axis0.text:
CASE 
WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Start") > (<%=toleranceBeforeStart%>+0) THEN 'too early' 
WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Start") < (<%=toleranceAfterStart%>+0)*(-1) THEN 'too late' 
ELSE 'on time'
END

meta.expressionLhs: CASE WHEN REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( PU_LAST ( "AFPO" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Scheduled finish time' ) , DAYS ) - REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( PU_LAST ( "AFPO" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Actual finish time' ) , DAYS ) > ( 2 + 0 ) THEN 'too early' WHEN REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( PU_LAST ( "AFPO" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Scheduled finish time' ) , DAYS ) - REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( PU_LAST ( "AFPO" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" , "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Actual finish time' ) , DAYS ) < ( 2 + 0 ) * ( -1 ) THEN 'too late' ELSE 'on time' END AS "#{adherenceSchedules}"

axis0.name: #{adherenceSchedules}
axis0.text:
CASE 
WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Finish") > (<%=toleranceBeforeEnd%>+0) THEN 'too early' 
WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Finish") < (<%=toleranceAfterEnd%>+0)*(-1) THEN 'too late' 
ELSE 'on time'
END

axis0.name: <%= ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AUFK"."BUKRS_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."BUKRS"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AFPO"."DWERK_TEXT"'?'#{"AFPO"."DWERK"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AUFK"."GSBER_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."GSBER"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."PRCTR"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AFPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'?'#{"material"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AFPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'?'#{"materialGroup"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"CRHD"."MATYP"'?'#{"CRHD"."MATYP"}': ''%>
axis0.translatedName: <%= ButtonDrilldown3== '"AUFK"."BUKRS_TEXT"'  ? 'Company Code': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AFPO"."DWERK_TEXT"'  ? 'Plant' : ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AUFK"."GSBER_TEXT"'  ? 'Business Area': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT"'  ? 'Profit Center': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AFPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'  ? 'Material': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AFPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'  ? 'Material group':''%>

axis2.name: #{adherenceSchedules} #{start}
axis2.text:
AVG(
    CASE 
    WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Start") <=(<%=toleranceBeforeStart%>+0) AND KPI("Difference Planned Actual Start") >= (<%=toleranceAfterStart%>+0)*(-1)
    THEN 1.0
    ELSE 0.0
    END
)

axis2.name: #{adherenceSchedules} #{finish}
axis2.text:
AVG( 
    CASE 
    WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Finish") <= (<%=toleranceBeforeEnd%>+0) AND KPI("Difference Planned Actual Finish") >= (<%=toleranceAfterEnd%>+0)*(-1)
    THEN 1.0 
    ELSE 0.0 
    END 
)

components.title: #{adherenceSchedules} #{by} <%= ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AUFK"."BUKRS_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."BUKRS"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AFPO"."DWERK_TEXT"'?'#{"AFPO"."DWERK"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AUFK"."GSBER_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."GSBER"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."PRCTR"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AFPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'?'#{"material"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"AFPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'?'#{"materialGroup"}': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"CRHD"."MATYP"'?'#{"CRHD"."MATYP"}': ''%>

formula.text:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT")=1 THEN "AUFK"."PRCTR" 
ELSE "AUFK"."PRCTR" || ' - ' || "AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT" 
END

formula.text:
CASE 
    WHEN ISNULL("AFPO"."XLOEK") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "AFPO"."XLOEK" = 'X' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "AFPO"."XLOEK"
END
